channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1437228164087009281
item.description: Usando los #datosabiertos de #VacunacionCOVID19 del @Minsa_Peru, noté que muchas personas han viajado de Amazonas a otros Departamentos para su segunda dosis, pero no es el único caso. En https://t.co/t2A3ivyfH4, hay una visualización que intenta mostrar esta situación. #Peru https://t.co/EYRfbZ8LCV

La situación de cada entidad federativa puede consultarse aquí: https://t.co/QVAnydCEDB. https://t.co/LLJ3NQYP1C

item.title: #en @ 1437078435822809093
item.description:
BPD will stop at nothing to try to make people think there's a lot of crime in Burlington.
Weak effort, though. This appears to just be a low-quality PDF export of data that's been available on the city's "Open Data Portal" for years.
https://t.co/0mfKZ2F908

item.title: #de @ 1437076825231052806
item.description: Magdeburger*innen sollten nicht bei der Verwaltung um Daten betteln müssen. Darum setzen wir uns als Fraktion für mehr #OpenData in #Magdeburg ein. Das schafft Transparenz und neue Potenziale in unserer Stadt. https://t.co/aMhn2k6zep

Personas vacunadas: Con 2 dosis: 8 800 534 Con solo 1 dosis: 3 239 182 https://t.co/Rfm4dNGV7s

item.title: #ja @ 1437067972942581762
#th @ 1437065737605025803
item.description: ไหนๆวันนี้ก็สตาร์ทเครื่องด่าล่ะ ขอด่าพรรคส้มต่ออีกสักประเด็น คือพรรคพยายามชูเรื่อง Open Data แต่ภายในพรรคแม่งยังไม่มีระบบ Open Data เลย ระบบสมุดพก สส. ที่ทำตอนอนาคตใหม่คือดีมากแต่ไม่สานต่อ เอาแค่รายชื่อกรรมการสรรหาผู้สมัคร กรรมการวินัยที่พิจารณาเรื่องงูเห่า ยังแทบไม่มีใครรู้เลยอะ

item.title: #fi @ 1437056698112430094
item.description:
@lasleh @hsfi #Scotland🏴󐁧󐁢󐁳󐁣󐁴󐁿 ottaa #RokotePassi käyttöön jo #Lokakuu’n alusta. Skotlannin tiedotuslinja ja politiikka on #OpenData.
#Englanti🏴󐁧󐁢󐁥󐁮󐁧󐁿 ei. Englannin päätöstä pidetään politisoituneena, lasten #Covid19Kids-tauti leviää kouluissa. Hallitus peitteli #DeltaVariant koululeviämisen tilastot. https://t.co/Vtq3I2UWsu

item.title: #ja @ 1437053591848554501
item.description:
【2021年09月11日 九州地方の火山性地震】
阿蘇山 29回 51⤵︎ ※ 孤立型微動 170回 184⤵︎ 霧島山（えびの高原（硫黄山）周辺）1回 2↘︎ 霧島山（新燃岳）4回 6⤵︎ 桜島 2回 4↘︎ 薩摩硫黄島 4回→ 口永良部島 6回 2↗︎‼️‼️ 諏訪之瀬島 21回 31⤵︎
https://t.co/on808GLfue ﾒﾓ

item.title: #en @ 1436999397116612612
item.description:
#Copernicus for #Wine🍷
Our #OpenData can be used to optimise winegrowers' grape production (see tweet ⬇️)
Experts estimate the 2020 US winemaking industry's loss due to West Coast #Wildfires at $ 3.7 Bn
⬇️#Sentinel2 view of #Oregon's main Pinot Noir production area on 4 Sept. https://t.co/U2fDcOXlUv

item.title: #en @ 1436982114130571266
item.description:
It's great to work with representatives of environmental NGOs from 7 EU Countries and share our methods for the #CivicMonitoring of EU funding based on #OpenData! Here in Lecce (IT) with @luigireggi @gianguaz @ingmmo
#ESIFunds #CohesionPolicy #RecoveryPlan #ClimateChange https://t.co/zNn1lqDMVn

item.title: #en @ 1436977885022199814
item.description:

#SeabedMapping #OpenData
@Dept_ECC @GeolSurvIE @MarineInst @ArcGISStoryMaps @pure_cork @corkharbour https://t.co/3QMN5grrLf

item.title: #fi @ 1436968021206126595
item.description:
On aika tehdä #ValtakunnanTason #MaskiPakko kouluihin. Ei voi olettaa, että asioista kenties hyvin tietämättömät kuntapäättäjät lukevat päivittäin #OpenData ympäri maailmaa ja löytävät uudet tilastot joiden perusteella on #Fakta:
#DeltaVariant vie myös #Lapset dairaalahoitoon. https://t.co/g3LJbqC3l6

item.title: #de @ 1436955659640131584
item.description:
Die EU will den Binnenmarkt für Daten und erlässt eifrig Rechtsakte:
#FFD: FreeFlowOfData-VO #OpenData-#PSI-RL #DGA: DataGovernanceAct #DSA: DigitalServicesAct #DMA: DigitalMarketsAct #AIA: ArtificialIntelligenceAct #DataAct
Immer aber bleibt die #DSGVO "unberührt": https://t.co/OKDVU79S3A

item.title: #de @ 1436952870117593089
item.description: Heute ist "Tag des offenen Denkmals". Wann kommt der "Tag der offenen (Kultur-)Daten"? Vll. tut #codingdavinci was dafür z. B. beim @cdvNiederRhein #kulturdigital #opendata #openGLAM

item.title: #fi @ 1436934746718838785
item.description:

Kuinka paljon on Suomessa #Covid19Kids, #LongCovidKids ja #MISCKids? Muualla maailmassa nämä luvut ovat julkisia, mikseivät meillä? 1/ https://t.co/Mu84zMlt1Z

item.title: #en @ 1436772696008937476
item.description: @drjohnm Open data is good, @drjohnm, but it is a weak defense of your work. You still need robust methods. You are still responsible. Peer reviewers have already found multiple classification errors. Those errors are serious and should be caught before dissemination.

item.title: #en @ 1436769387525017603
item.description: Feminism is not institutionalised Nadia, it’s a movement not a ministry. Different NGOs have different set of objectives. Can’t expect them to publish open data when da gov couldn’t even do that themselves. https://t.co/joTc0H7iA8

item.title: #en @ 1436708781195468803
item.description:
It is surprising to me — and quite sad actually— that someone at this level of science critiques our paper without reading it.
For if you had, you would have seen a link to the app that allows everyone to review the actual case forms.
Prof G … please, it’s open data. https://t.co/PUlTCNFukw

item.title: #en @ 1436696417872011275
item.description:
The official dashboard seems to have updated, so you can check some of the figures there: https://t.co/VA66NgQyO7
But its just that none of the Open Data files have been updated yet. Not sure if/when they will be released, but I'll update my page with them when I can!

item.title: #en @ 1436657524195962881
item.description:
To advance the #SustainableDevelopmentGoals, it is critical to have data and statistics that are accurate, timely, relevant and easy to use.
The @UN Open #SDG Data Hub allows to keep track of the progress made so far: https://t.co/yQI54GtQfQ https://t.co/BTJJDM4S7D

item.title: #nl @ 1436645913070653442
item.description:
Het gebrek aan goede open data is sowieso stuitend. Want om het Nederlandse percentage te schatten, moet je de RIVM percentages omrekenen. Dus wel wat onnauwkeurigheid.
Maar voor de liefhebbers:
https://t.co/fhJksxd19B https://t.co/HoEZNGB53P https://t.co/gKUIzOlcaK

item.title: #de @ 1436637877014835203
item.description:
In einer Stellungsnahme zu Open Data und Wegekatastern argumentiert die @Ottostadt gegen Open Data.
So streut man den Leuten Sand in die Augen. Man vergleicht sich einfach mal mit sämtlichen Kommunen in D.
So geht der Umgang mit Zahlen in der Magdeburger Stadtverwaltung. #srmd https://t.co/BLRRiUl11j

item.description: La trasparenza via #opendata non è una moda degli anni '10, dovrebbe essere un metodo acquisito. https://t.co/GDWZe20Hfo

item.title: #en @ 1436593088940683265
item.description: @firassabiad Good luck @firassabiad. I will only congratulate you when and if you (1) succeed in your duties or (2) resign if you're not allowed. Please have zero tolerance for mediocrity, maintain this close distance with the people, and help release open data for the scientific community!

item.title: #de @ 1436589979086508034
item.description: Am Donnerstag habe ich im #srmd den Antrag zum Wegekataster eingebracht. Es geht um Open Data & bessere Orientierung in der Stadt. Durch eine gute Datenlage & ein konstantes Monitoring kann die Wegequalität sogar verbessert werden. #OpenData #Naherholung https://t.co/bE82vIYcl6

item.title: #de @ 1436571469719429121
item.description: Heute geht's los, wir präsentieren unser Datenpaket zum historischen Rheinufer Düssedorfs und hoffen, dass damit tolle Projekte entstehen können! https://t.co/TJefbMxnyO #opendata #codingdavinci #codingdavinciniederrheinland #0211kulturdigital #hackathon#opendataddorf https://t.co/e4PV5yGAKe

item.title: #en @ 1436565377593401348
item.description:
The @KiniNewsLab and @malaysiakini retired its Covid-19 tracker after 18 months, following the launch of the Covidnow website. https://t.co/Yoa25aUD7f
I worked on it for ~ a year, in an environment open data on Covid in Malaysia was not a thing. It is now. 🥳
TQ for ur support. https://t.co/g7XXKSiYcY

item.title: #en @ 1436525082533261320
item.description:
Bon Moya's contribution to the PH government is incalculable. His advocacy of Open Data, Gov't is already enough to seal his legacy, but I think his greatest impact would be seen when the Unified Account Codes Structure (UACS) becomes fully operational as he envisioned it.
RIP.

item.title: #es @ 1436413088065069067
item.description:
La pregunta debe ser realizada. Que hizo Uruguay que no hicimos nosotros?
* Cantidad de test y combinación * Detección temprana y aislamiento * Manejo oportuno de datos abiertos * Campañas de educación
En CR nunca pudimos diferenciar el ruido para tener el gran picture. https://t.co/ObBztHnRlE

item.description: Pretty jazzed to be on a bilingual panel with @GouvOuvertQc to discuss co-creation in #opendata! And with a jam-packed schedule of superb talent, you'll also get to hear from other open data champs like @AmyBihari @TraceyLauriault @JeanNoeLandry1 & @DerekAlton! Be there! #CODS21 https://t.co/fRBVmilKNQ

item.title: #en @ 1436402863182426115
item.description:
Kids could ask family & friends to collect clean cups that they take to school. The redemptions from the cups could be used to pay for a new library or a clean-water project overseas. The coffee company could even donate matching funds.
Everything is part of an open data commons https://t.co/oiLHNr8zNB

item.title: #en @ 1436397971579473927
item.description:

item.description: The @PySport open-source website (https://t.co/hOTvobJoO1) provides an excellent starting point. The website currently lists no fewer than 2 open-data repositories and 44 software libraries: 24 Python libraries, 19 R libraries and 1 Haskell library. (2/20)

item.title: #en @ 1436326912574562317
item.description:
@WHO estimates that more than 400,000 people die from malaria each year
Our #opendata allows detection of areas where parasites 🦟causing it can easily proliferate
📅Register for our workshop on #Copernicus & Public #Health on 15-16 September💡
More 🔗https://t.co/3kAOwVxUeo https://t.co/TuEyGCqCi0

item.title: #it @ 1436321943515504647
item.description: @flavia_marzano @Piersoft @_andrea_lisis @SGInnovazione @diritto2punto0 @morenaragone @fernandafaini @fabriziobarca @FrancoBassanini @gdt62 @AntonioNicita @DaVelSign Iniziamo a chiedere la gazzetta in OpenData in #AkomaNtoso come altri paesi hanno già fatto (e.g., UK, USA, LUX, Cile, etc.)? item.title: #de @ 1436321559048855552
item.description: Heute hat #Kabinett in #SH ein #Digitalisierungsgesetz mit Schwerpunkt #OpenGovernment #OpenSource #OpenData verabschiedet, das gemeinwohlorientierte #Gestaltung der #Digitalisierung in den Mittelpunkt stellt. Herzlichen Dank an @JanAlbrecht & sein Haus!

item.title: #en @ 1436319801471766538
item.description:
Devastated by the passing of Bon Moya, former budget undersecretary, one of the champions of open government and open data in the Philippines.
This is the only photo I have of us together. We were in a Data Journalism panel in 2015, where he was discussing open budget reforms. https://t.co/OnZhKnEyDG

item.title: #de @ 1436271557077258248
item.description: Ich freue mich sehr! @ThilakMahendran hat mich gefragt, ob ich auf dem 2. Fachforum #Opendata etwas über den Wert von offenen Daten für den Datenjournalismus erzählen mag. Mach ich gern! Und ich hab noch ein paar Wünsche im Gepäck. #FFSTD #CCOD #ddj https://t.co/4uE4vmJkqW
